heading: Arranging Shipment
description: For SMEs we often recommend that you go forward with a Freight Forwarder as they are aware of shipment procedure as well as the documents required.
1: Proper Planning (ensure realistic delivery dates to ensure reputation)
2: Quality Control (final product should be same as approved samples)
3_1: Should indicate Port of entry, description of merchandise
4: Ensure you have the correct clearance depending on merchandise being exported
